title: Artifacts
description: *Artifacts* describes non-PGXN links and checksums for downloading the distribution in one or more formats, including source code, binaries, system packages, etc. Consumers **MAY** use this information to determine the best option for installing an extension on a particular system. Useful for projects that publish their own binaries, such as in GitHub releases.

url.description: The URL to download the artifact.

type.description: The type of artifact. **MUST** be a single lowercase word describing the artifact, such as none of `binary`, `source`, `rpm`, `homebrew`, etc.

platform.description: Identifies the platform the artifact was built for. **RECOMMENDED** for packages compiled for a specific platform, such as a C extension compiled for `linux-arm64`.

sha256.description: The SHA-256 checksum for the artifact in hex format.

sha512.description: The SHA-512 checksum for the artifact in hex format.
